amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funds in the bill from being used to enforce regulations requiring within two years construction of agency relief projects funded by the Federal Highway Administration.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part C of House Report 116-51 to prohibit funds in the bill from being used to enforce regulations requiring within two years construction of agency relief projects funded by the Federal Highway Administration.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Huffman amendment (A006) Agreed to by recorded vote: 241 - 168 (Roll no. 199).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Huffman.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Huffman amendment (A006) Agreed to by recorded vote: 241 - 168 (Roll no. 199).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
